comment: An interesting night in our house resulting in one broken toilet seat , one sore back and one son starting work at am . I say interesting ...

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (n / night
            :mod (ii / interesting)
            :location (h / house
                  :poss (w / we))
            :ARG1-of (r / result-01
                  :ARG2 (a / and
                        :op1 (s / seat
                              :quant 1
                              :mod (t / toilet)
                              :ARG1-of (b / break-01))
                        :op2 (s2 / sore
                              :mod (b2 / back))
                        :op3 (s3 / start-01
                              :ARG0 (p / person
                                    :quant 1
                                    :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                                          :ARG2 (s4 / son)))
                              :ARG1 (w2 / work-01
                                    :ARG0 p)
                              :time (d / date-entity
                                    :time "18:00")))))
      :snt2 (s5 / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (ii3 / interesting)))
